title: How to get users for my local social network - Quora

response.answer_text: Not to be glib, but the answer is to get some other users first. Try to find a dedicated core of people who promise to use it exclusively, or at least often. Can’t figure out how to induce them to do that? Go back to the drawing board to figure out real reasons for them to support you, and be ready to check in with them often. (I hope your User Interface is excellent.)
